transcript:
Customer: Jis vyakti se aapne call kiya hai, woh sadhya itar kunashi bolat hai. Aapan pratiksha karu sakta, kiva nantar punha prayatna karu sakta. Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai.

Hellow?

Hellow?

Hellow?

Executive: Haan.

Executive: Uh so hi, main Pallavi bol rahi hu sir IndiaMART se.

Customer: Haan haan boliye madam.

Executive: Sir baat hui thi aap se?

Customer: Haan haan boliye.

Executive: Haan main keh rahi thi sir aapki services ka renewal hai. Uh aapne aapki ghar mein kuch family emergency thi aur uske regarding hum phir baat nahi kar pa rahe the. Toh aapne bola tha ki aap ek baar ek wahi like aaj Monday ki.

Customer: Teen saal ka kuch kiya hua hai na madam apan ne?

Executive: Nahi nahi sir main bata rahi hu aapki na star service chal rahi hai uska renewal hai sir. Star service ka jo premium services chal rahi hai na uska renewal hai jiski wajah se aapki listing jo hai woh top pe hai sir.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Abhi aap har jagah jaise aap Aurangabad mein, Bhopal mein, Delhi mein, Hyderabad mein, Indore in sab jagah pe aapki visibility top pe aa rahi hai. Epoxy flooring services mein, epoxy coatings mein, right? Uh so usi ke regarding na jaise aap Thane mein, Pune mein, Navi Mumbai mein aapki jo ranking hai jaise top supplier aa rahi hai in product line mein sir epoxy coatings aur flooring services mein.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Customer: Haan. Madam ek thoda sa hamara anubhav aisa hai ki hum service de nahi pa rahe abhi woh mere do lakh rupay maine bhar diye woh gaye kaam se aise samajh ke humne chhod diya hai. Toh hame interest nahi raha abhi karne mein kyuki kya hai mera banda agar ghum jaye toh woh lead bhi hum close kar sakte hai. Aap abhi kisko kisko business dene wale hai aapke paas jo listed hai sabko business dete ho aur jo main mera anubhav aisa aaya mujhe ki do mahine pehle di hui lead mere paas do mahine ke baad aa rahi hai. Samne wala banda seedha bol raha hai ki samne walo ko aap nikal baat karo paisa itna bhar rahe ho aap. Toh woh matlab nahi hai.

Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye mujhe batayenge kaun IndiaMART aapke yaha use karte hai?

Customer: Main hi karta hu use woh.

Executive: Achcha ek cheez do teen jo bhi kiya tha haan.

Executive: Haan usages mein na aap ek aapko ek cheez bata rahi hu aapki profile Anushka construction ki na visibility Mumbai ke har ek san shahar mein na sabse top pe hai ye hamare paas customer ka feedback aaya hai aapke paas. Theek hai? IndiaMART se abhi aapne bola ki aapne do lakh rupay lagaye kyuki kahin na kahin aapne utna use nahi kiya sir aur dusri cheez catalog mein corrections bhi required hai. Catalog mein bahut sari cheeze add on ho rahi hai jiski wajah se aapki jo daily calls hai na woh badhne wali hai. Matlab main jo ab is baar aapko service dungi isme mainly ye mere chances honge ki aapka daily calls badhe. And I am not telling you aapko do lakh rupay nahi dena hai sir. Agla teen saal se jayenge tab woh alag baat hai ki do saal ki service aapko teen saal ki service mil jayegi. Lekin this is all about aap jaha pe first pe dikh rahe Indore mein jaha pe aap Mumbai mein first pe dikh rahe hai. Theek hai? Toh waha pe aap agar isko degrade karenge na toh aapki ranking phir 40th number ke baad aa jayegi. Samajh samajh rahe ho 40th number ke baad aa jayegi. Toh main ye suggestions aapko bilkul nahi dungi aapka last experience kyuki usages mein bhi drop hai catalog mein bhi corrections required hai aur aap bhi thodi busy thi toh woh hum pura time nahi de paye sir IndiaMART pe. Toh ek baar aap aath saal hamare purane customer hai ek do saal purane customer hote toh main keh rahi thi ki aap isko band kara dijiye. Aap hamare aath saal purane customer hai sir.

Customer: Barabar.

Executive: Hai na? Toh main nahi kahungi ki aap isko bilkul bhi band karaiye aur agar sir fund ka koi issue nahi hai tab toh aap two plus one wale offer pe bhi ja sakte hai lekin agar aapko hai ki chaliye ek saal leke dekhte hai toh aap ek saal ka hi karaiye aur koi do lakh rupay nahi lagne sir isme. Theek hai? Premium services aapko bas jo hamara premium ka plan ka charge hai woh toh lagega lekin kuch add on benefits mil jayenge aapko jisme aapka catalog main ek baar naya banwa dungi kuch premium keywords add kara dungi sir aapke epoxy flooring services mein aur epoxy flooring mein jisme sabse jyada IndiaMART pe leads hai sir. Rahi baat aapki team ki ki woh use nahi karne ki abhi banda baitha hai. Sir aap na bas agar mujhe char din bhi time de denge na main woh char din mein itna transfer kar dungi ki aapke samne se calls bhi aa jayengi shayad aapka deal close ho jayega.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Kuch toh hai sir IndiaMART pe tabhi aap aath saal se IndiaMART pe hai na hamare.

Customer: Main ek kaam karta hu mere partner jo hai na Mumbai mein jo baithte hai ye dekhte hai unka number de raha hu unko mera login id aur woh sabhi de deta hu main. Haan woh dekhenge abhi uske aage main actually abhi Aurangabad main dekh raha hu mere partner jo hai woh Bombay dekhenge. Toh aap thoda unke sath agar discuss karenge na toh unko bata dijiye woh already usi line mein hai toh woh phir mujhe kya karna hai kya nahi woh bata denge main unko baat kar leta hu sir.

Executive: Sir number batayenge ek baar aap?

Customer: Main bhej deta hu aapko number.

Executive: Aur sir main ye keh rahi hu like aap akele decision lekar aap dono hai ya sirf woh hai?

Customer: Nahi dono bhi hai dono milke lenge decision usme. Isliye main aapko bola na ki unko aap discuss kijiye.

Executive: Ye bahut achchi hui ki aapne bata diya hai ki toh usages wagera ko lekar unhi ko mujhe batana hoga. Sir ek cheez main aapko dekhiye aap dono ka mutual understanding mere liye bahut zaruri hai kyuki main isme jo proposal mein add on benefits karungi woh phir aath saal mein aapko kabhi bhi nahi mila hoga sir.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Theek hai? Toh aap ek baar pehle toh discussion kar lete ki sir ka discussion kahan tak ja raha hai aur agar isko degrade karayenge sir toh ye just zarur samjhe ki Anushka construction ka itna uh visibility ek branding ho rakha hai IndiaMART pe. Degrade kara matlab matlab har customer ko ye lagegi ki Anushka construction ki ab value koi IndiaMART ke platform pe hai hi nahi.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Aapke reviews achche hai aur thoda bahut add on benefits jo dungi na uske aapke daily calls badhenge aap agar use nahi kar pa rahe toh koshish kijiye ki daily inquiries aapki badha paun sir main meri priority ye hongi.

Customer: Abhi renewal charges kya hai aapke?

Executive: Sir dekhiye aapne jo last time pay kara hai na woh aap abhi jaise aap agar two plus hamare paas do offers bhi hai pehle toh aapka jo hamara sir uh jo category hai na uh abhi 66 66 66 ki category hai ek minute main dekh leti hu aapka. Last time aapne jo pay kara tha woh kareeban do lakh rupay ke kareeban pay kara tha category ek baar batayenge kaun kaun se category pe aap ja rahe hai?

Customer: Mera epoxy related PU related car park related jo bhi hai woh pure category rahegi.

Executive: Toh ek epoxy floor coating services rahega ek epoxy floor services rahega. Theek hai ek floor coating sorry epoxy floor uh uh woh le lenge theek hai abhi haan toh abhi main ek kaam karta hu madam ek aadhe ghante mein karu main call aapko? Main ek aadhe ghante mein call karta hu aapko.

Executive: Chalega sir theek hai sure okay sir. Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads.

- Feels that the money is wasted.

- Leads are coming after two months.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of renewal.

- Executive offered to add premium keywords.

- Executive suggested to discuss with partner.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with his partner.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Negative | Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, leads, catalog, visibility, services
